wifi_sinus.api

Class WiFiSinus

  • java.lang.Object
    • wifi_sinus.api.WiFiSinus

  • public class WiFiSinus
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class to control the WiFi-Sinus Generator.

      • activateSweep

        public void activateSweep(int min,
                          int max,
                          int delay,
                          int resolution,
                          boolean reverse,
                          boolean pong)
        Activates the sweep output.
        Parameters:
        min - The lower Frequency of the sweep (in Hz)
        max - The upper Freuquency of the sweep (in Hz)
        delay - The delay between two steps (in Âµs)
        resolution - The width of a step (in Hz)
        reverse - Should the sweep go from max to min?
        pong - Should the sweep change its direction after touch a border.
